Text:
mr taylorswiftfreak, could you please confirm if this repack does have the following:
- 1.2 (update #2)
- dlc costumes (classic dante, etc...)
- dlc weapons (bone, gold, samurai)
- pre-order perks (like super-dante and item finder)
- bloody palace

If anyone want to add bloody palace , just download update 1 include dlc RELOADED, then 
download vergil downfall RELOADED again and finally crack it with the files within the crack folder ( a bit messy but that worked for me , since after update 1 vergil downfall will be overwritten )
download again!? what's the point of repacking the game!?
what is the song in this setup?
